install:
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && (grep -qxF 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' "$HOME/.profile" || printf '
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
' >> "$HOME/.profile") && (grep -qxF 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' "$HOME/.bashrc" || printf '
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
' >> "$HOME/.bashrc") && python3 -m pip install --user pre-commit pytest boto3 semgrep && cd backend/infrastructure && npm ci && cd .. && python3 scripts/build_lambda_bundle.py --cache-only
start:
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && (grep -qxF 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' "$HOME/.profile" || printf '
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
' >> "$HOME/.profile") && (grep -qxF 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' "$HOME/.bashrc" || printf '
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
' >> "$HOME/.bashrc") && (python3 -m pip show pre-commit pytest boto3 semgrep >/dev/null 2>&1 || python3 -m pip install --user pre-commit pytest boto3 semgrep) && cd backend/infrastructure && ( [ -d node_modules ] || npm ci ) && cd .. && python3 scripts/build_lambda_bundle.py --cache-only
